item.title: Whats wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @Legend_Fate Legend Fate
item.description:
@Legend_Fate wrote:

if(playerRights <=0) { sendMessage("Welcome to the server."); } if(playerRights <=1) { sendMessage("Welcome back moderator "+playerName); } if(playerRights <=2) { sendMessage("Welcome back administrator "+playerName); } if(playerRights <=3) { sendMessage("Welcome back owner "+playerName); }

Thank You
